name: Basil the Bomb Hound
description:
Basil the Bomb Hound is a short timed platformer made for the 20 Second Game Jam, in which you play as a bomb defusal dog named Basil and help her platform her way through the Bomb Cats with her special boost!

This is my first game, but I'm happy with how it turned out

Arrow keys-Move

Z-Jump

X-Boost

Backspace(Hold)-Exit

Game may have screen tearing issues in full screen, so the 30fps version is recommended
